fields.name: technology
fields.description: The practical application of science to commerce or industry

fields.name: clutch
fields.description: A pedal or lever that engages or disengages a rotating shaft and a driving mechanism

fields.name: stack
fields.description: A list in which the next item to be removed is the item most recently stored (LIFO)

fields.name: surrealism
fields.description: A 20th century movement of artists and writers (developing out of dadaism) who used fantastic images and incongruous juxtapositions in order to represent unconscious thoughts and dreams

fields.name: altruism
fields.description: The quality of unselfish concern for the welfare of others

fields.name: artificial intelligence
fields.description: The branch of computer science that deal with writing computer programs that can solve problems creatively

fields.name: car
fields.description: A motor vehicle with four wheels; usually propelled by an internal combustion engine
